Original_Story: Keith was taking a long road trip to the Grand Canyon. He was behind schedule so he did not want to stop. Since he was feeling tired, Keith drank a lot of coffee and water. He started to feel uncomfortable because of it but refused to stop.
Distorted_Story: Keith was taking a long road trip to the Grand Canyon. He was on time so he wanted to stop. Since he was feeling tired, Keith drank a lot of coffee and water. He started to feel uncomfortable because of it but refused to stop.
